title: poruttu en pizhaiyai
sahitya:
poruttu en pizhaiyai peridenak-karudAmal aruL puriyumE karuNai mighu murugA


anupallavi

  karuttuDanE unnai aDaiyEn iduvarai karudit-tozhAmal kAlam kazhittadai


caraNam    uLLonru vaittu uNmaiyai maraindu kaLLa vEDattODu kapaTa nATakamADi 
eLLaLavEnum vaLLi maNALA un iNaiyaDiyai nAn ninaiyAdirundadai
